full_summary:
#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO): Vehicle Repair and Maintenance

#### Publication Date: March 4, 2024
#### Closing Date: March 19, 2024 at 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the periodic maintenance and repair of its vehicle fleet. The fleet consists of standard commercial vehicles, including cars, pick-up trucks, and cargo vans/trucks.

#### Procurement Details:
* Procurement Category: SRVTGD
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Traditional
* Trade Agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and others
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contract Details:
* Standing Offer Period: 3 years from the date of issuance with options to extend for two additional 1-year periods
* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Submission Requirements:
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French

#### Contact Information:
* Matthew Yaraskovitch, Matthew.yaraskovitch@forces.gc.ca, (613) 945-2762

#### Tender Documents:
* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33298/2.-w6399-24-lq58---rfso_0.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33298/2b.-w6399-24-lq58---rfso-fr.pdf
